Description:
**UNDER CONTRACT ** VENDOR WANTS IT SOLD THIS WEEKEND OR IT WILL BE RENTED OUT. MAKE AN OFFER!!!
*** GENUINE SELLERS***
Get out of the rent race and put your money into something that is yours.
On a very flat and sunny block, this 3 bedroom home represents excellent value and potential in today's market with the master bedroom being HUGE!! Both the bathroom and kitchen have been updated, the latter with a stainless steel trio: 1. wall oven 2. gas hot plates 3. dishwasher. In addition, there is a separate laundry, outdoor toilet, front porch and outdoor entertaining space. Plenty of off-street parking on the usable 900 m2 allotment with the added comfort of ducted heating and a wood fire. The current zoning may offer the potential for future subdivision, subject to council approval. Just a short stroll to the main street, a variety of shops pre and primary school, sporting facilities and bus connections and on a sealed road.
Call Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522 or Steve Dolphin 0412 996 609 or Mat Fitch 0473 363 606 to arrange an inspection.
consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Please note: All property details listed were current at the time of publishing. Due to extreme buyer demand, some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours. Therefore confirmation of all opens with the listing agent within 24 hours of their scheduled opening is advised.

Description:
DECKED OUT FOR ENTERTAINING
High set and positioned to provide a sun drenched environment, this lovely home is ideal for first home buyers, downsizers or investors. Offering a large living room with solid fuel fire, polished floors and cafe doors that lead out to a deck that is a great place to settle back and take in the surrounds. The functional kitchen has plenty of cupboards, timber benches, dishwasher and servery window through to the living room. There are three bedrooms, the master with walk in robe and a family bathroom and separate toilet. Ducted gas heating throughout adds to your comfort. The rear deck will play host to a variety of happy gatherings around the barbie and a third deck has a garden shed adjoining. There are fruit trees and a chook run to aid in your self-sufficient lifestyle. All of this within walking distance of Reserve, playground, walking trails, shops, renowned Primary School and all that the friendly township has to offer.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.
Insights: 13 Alexander Road, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2018 and 38 other 3 bedroom house in Cockatoo have recently been sold.

Description:
Practically Perfect in Every Way!
Green foliage and a beautiful canopy of trees offer a gentle invitation to explore this fully renovated, stylish 3 bedroom home. As you enter the landscaped front garden via the bitumen drive and winding front path, you will be immediately charmed by this pretty WRC home with full length verandahs to front and rear. All the hard work has been completed by the current owners; including new carpets, fresh paint internally and quality fixtures and fittings. The home features soaring timber ceilings, charming timber dado, plus fully renovated kitchen showcasing stone benches, upgraded bathroom and laundry. Family entertaining is assured with loads of paving, generous covered BBQ/outdoor dining, cubby house, expansive lawn areas, fruit trees and more. Three bay 10.5m x 7m barn style garage, with additional toilet facilities; loads of room for cars, hobbies, or whatever your heart desires, completes the list of inclusions. All situated on an almost level ¼ acre of fully fenced land within walking distance of Cockatoo primary and shops. This unique home is a must see.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820
Please note: All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office

Description:
THE DELIGHTS OF PUFFING BILLY AND NATURE ON 1062m2
A touch of style combined with the character and warmth of timber lined cathedral ceilings and polished timber floors has created an inviting environment that offers a wonderful place to call home. There is a living room with large picture windows and split level kitchen and meals area with sliding door out to the rear deck, an ideal place to enjoy alfresco dining. Settle back and take in the beauty of a variety of colourful birds that parade at the bird feeder and delight in the sights and sound of Puffing Billy chugging along the tracks at the rear boundary. All of the bedrooms have built in robes and are large enough for a queen sized bed. Ducted gas heating and air-conditioner add to your enjoyment. Situated in a no through road on a leafy yard of over ¼ acre, there is plenty of room for outdoor activities, double carport and only a short walk to the local shops and our highly regarded Primary School.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
WALK TO EVERYTHING ON 1046m2
Rarely do you find a home in your price range that is in such a fantastic location. Perfectly positioned in a no through road you can walk to the town centre and our highly regarded Primary School. High set to take in the outlook which includes our iconic Puffing Billy chugging along the track, you can enjoy country living to full advantage. The home has been tastefully updated with modern tones and offers an open plan living area that adjoins the kitchen that has parquetry floors, renovated bathroom complete with a relaxing spa bath and three bedrooms all with built in robes. Other features include gas heating, split system heating & cooling, and ceiling fans in all rooms. Set on ¼ acre there is an abundance of established trees and shrubs, sealed driveway access and a double garage to house your vehicles or provide the ideal place for tradesman or hobbyist to tinker.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
PEACE AND PRIVACY ON JUST OVER ½ ACRE
This well presented family home is set on a sunny allotment of just over ½ an acre, and is perfectly positioned in one of Cockatoos most highly sought locations. The magnificent garden lovers paradise has plenty for the family to enjoy, with large open lawn areas, established gardens and much more. The home itself lends itself to a wonderful family lifestyle with a versatile floor plan, including 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, well-appointed kitchen in the heart of the home, an open plan living space that includes family lounge, and dining that opens out to a covered veranda and a paved entertaining area which provides the ideal place to sit back and enjoy the sunshine year round. Special features include ducted heating and a crackling wood heater. Outside also offers workshop, double carport and plenty of space for trailers, boats or a caravan, and a rear gate with access to the adjoining reserve. Perfect for a growing family!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Charming Home on ½ Acre!
If you have been looking to get out of the rental market or looking to downsize, then this cute 2 bedroom weatherboard cottage is the perfect choice!. Situated on a landscaped ½ acre block, this well presented home is on the high side of the road with great views of the surrounding bush. Featuring a cosy wood heater in the lounge room, 9’ ceilings, a split system & a neat kitchen with meals area and two good sized bedrooms with built in robes, this home offers comfortable living and is ready for you to move and enjoy. Appreciate the surrounding bush aspect and the sounds of nature while you relax on the front verandah or spend time with friends and family on the large entertaining deck. The avid gardener will love this property with it's terraced and landscaped gardens full of bird attracting flowering natives, camellias and established trees. Stroll along the established pathways to the vegetable garden, fruit trees and single lock up shed. Secure gated decks & yards make it safe for children and pets and this home is conveniently located close to the Cockatoo township. Get in for an inspection quickly before you miss out!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
START YOUR COUNTRY LIFE HERE ON APPROX. 3479m2
Tucked away on over ¾ of an acre is this family home that offers privacy and seclusion. The home has a large living room with a bluestone fireplace as a centrepiece and an adjoining step up dining area that leads on to the timber kitchen and family meals area. The living area features soaring timber lined ceilings that provide a sense of space and add a touch of drama. There are four big bedrooms all serviced by the family bathroom as well. Outdoors there is enough space for every activity with plenty of usable land for the avid gardener or children to play and pets to romp around and the abundance of native bird life will make this a haven for all. There is a double carport under roofline and loads of room for extra vehicles and ‘toys’. Just a short drive to our highly regarded Primary School, shopping centre and a variety of sporting facilities, if you have been looking for a property that you can add you own stamp to, you must arrange your inspection today.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
LARGE ON LIVING, LARGE SHED, QUIET LOCATION
Set in a quiet location in a leafy no through road, this spacious family home has a huge deck that affords a fabulous outlook, a four car plus workshop shed that may make a grown man weep for joy and a fenced allotment for the four-legged family members accessed via electric gate.
Offering four bedrooms the main with stylish ensuite, enviable kitchen with upright stove, a wall oven and dishwasher, a positively huge lounge room, dining room, family bathroom with bath and shower, a laundry and separate WC.
For all seasons comfort additions include ceiling fans, a wood fire, ducted heating, air conditioning and throw away the vacuum as you have a ducted system here.
This property ticks all the boxes you’re looking for in a community you’ll love! Close to Cockatoo Township, the primary school and bus connections you best move quick to secure this one!
Contact Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522 or Janet Hawkins on 0409 117 432 to arrange your inspection today.

Description:
Spacious Family Home with Dual Accom or Home Office Potential
This spacious, solid brick family home with flexible floor plan of up to 6 bedrooms, is set on an open, north facing half acre with picturesque views across the valley. With a total of 9 rooms, including a large 2 roomed bungalow, this property is ideal for those seeking a teenager retreat, a large home office or dependant living / dual accommodation (STCA).
Both the family room and large lounge / dining room are graced by open fire places and the L shaped open plan family room / kitchen with WIP and abundance of cupboards and draws, is kept cool by the wide veranda in summer, and fills with sunshine in winter.
The king-size master bedroom with full ensuite faces east to capture the morning light, and the queen sized loft bedroom has a WIR and direct access to the second bathroom, as well as to the large bungalow, making it ideal for teenagers. The remaining 2 single bedrooms also cluster next to the second bathroom and the laundry has direct access to the garden.
A sun-filled entertainment deck with 4 person spa overlooks the lawn and prolific citrus trees and the huge north facing bungalow, with ornate pot-belly and its own private access via a single carport, provides many options for a large family, including an extra 2 bedrooms, home office, or dual accommodation STCA.
A double carport leads to an extensive storage area that can be used as a garage/workshop or holds the potential to extend this already large family home even further. The property, which is accessed by a bitumen driveway, is surrounded by a total of 3 easily maintained sunny garden areas where children, pets and even veggies can roam free. For those who love to keep fit, bush-walking and bike tracks through the forest are also at the end of the road and its just a 10 minute walk to the Cockatoo shops, kindergarten and primary school, with a bus stop at the end of the road for Emerald SC, as well as Fountain Gate. NBN installed.
Please call Geoff Powell on 0418 102 830 to inspect.
Insights: 39 Second Avenue, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2018 and 7 other 5 bedroom house in Cockatoo have recently been sold.

Description:
“TAKARO PARK” Country Living at its Best!
This amazing property is perfect for those looking for the ultimate rural lifestyle situated on just under 7 sun filled acres. The country style home with amazing views and full length verandah welcomes you surrounded by soft draping wisteria blooms, landscaped gardens and lush lawns. Featuring 3 robed bedrooms, the Master has a walk in robe and semi ensuite. Zoned living areas include the dining area, a bright and sunny lounge and large office designed for space and comfort in mind. Enjoy spending time in the large country styled kitchen with its stainless steel appliances, ample bench space and glass display wall cabinets, cooking up memorable meals for family and friends and then relax on the large covered decked entertaining area overlooking the arena and taking in the mountain views. Add to this a large storage/utility room that could make the foundation for a 4th bedroom, mains gas ducted heating and split system cooling. Outside features 3 water tanks, (and there is mains water available in the street), a triple bay shed with remote door and a double carport for caravans, floats or trailers. For the equine enthusiast there is 8 fenced paddocks with water troughs, electric fencing, hay shed, shelter boxes, 2 x stables, tack room, feed room with washing machine connection, hot and cold wash bay and an Olympic sized arena with views. The property is set up with, backup generator connection to the home, a large dam, dog run, a rear fenced yard, chicken coop, irrigated established gardens, vegie patch, a resident echidna & plenty of lush green lawns for the kids and pets to enjoy. There is so much to see an inspection is essential – call Sam today to arrange your private tour of this comprehensive, comfortable & stylish property!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032

Description:
Charming Family Home!
This 4 bedroom character hills western red cedar home is situated on a quarter of an acre close to public transport, schools & the Cockatoo township. Featuring stunning vaulted ceilings, polished floorboards and large windows, you will feel a comfortable sense of space in this home. Flowing over 3 split levels this light filled home features 3 robed bedrooms with the fourth room large enough to be used as a games room or 4th bedroom. The master is upstairs and has a large walk in robe and ensuite. The spacious dining area overlooks the lounge & is adjacent to the well-appointed kitchen with dishwasher, plenty of bench space, large double pantry and breakfast bar. The box window from the kitchen allows a good view of the rear yard. In the cooler months, you’ll be kept warm and cosy with gas ducted heating and an inviting wood fire heater. Outside you can take in the peaceful surroundings relaxing on the front deck or in the gardens surrounding this home. A short walk to Wright Forest Bushland Reserve provides hours of peaceful bush walks. This spacious family home oozes warmth & charm & needs to be seen to be fully appreciated!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
Start Right with a Nest Egg out the Back
This is an absolute cracker of a first home or investment property with the added benefit of being on a 1103m2 block suitable for sub-division (STCA). On a sealed road close to the public bus stop & Emerald Secondary School bus pick up and round the corner from Mountain Road Reserve - great for dog walking & home to Cockatoo basketball stadium, cricket & footy ground, little athletics track & archery club. You've hit the bull's eye with this one located in a Neighbourhood Residential Zone Schedule 1.
Plus, it just feels right. The high ceilings contribute to the homely feel as well as the view from the lounge room and the front porch across to trees and open skies. There's lots of potential for updates but completely liveable as is. The home is well insulated with ducted heating and a lovely wood-fired heater to keep you toasty. And those pesky power bills are off set by a 1.25kw Inverter harnessing the solar power.
Out through the large laundry there is a covered patio area and beyond is an open rear garden ready to grow your veggies. A large double garage awaits you for your tinkering pleasure.
Give me a buzz if you want to know more on 0428 744 498.
Insights: 96 Woori Yallock Road, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2018 and 38 other 3 bedroom house in Cockatoo have recently been sold.

Description:
COUNTRY CHARM MEETS CITY CHIC
Drenched in natural light and featuring modern style, this perfectly kept home offers a great opportunity to secure your first home that has all of the benefits of sleek city living combined with the beauty of a country environment. The open plan living room adjoins the kitchen which features updated stainless steel appliances. There are two bedrooms, the master has built in robes and the second bedroom has been carefully planned with a wall of stylish stacker doors that gives you the ability to use this room as an additional living room when required or a work from home situation as there are double doors out to the rear yard.. The leafy surrounds include colourful European plantings along with a variety of fruit trees to assist with a self-sufficient way of life. A barbeque ‘castle’ is the ideal vantage point to take in the beauty that surrounds. You can walk to the shops, Primary School and Cockatoo market or take a stroll along the trail to Gembrook. This golden opportunity will cater to your craving for modern living and your need for country charm.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
“Gully Views”
Get out your want list and start ticking off all the items.
?? Views – yep.
?? Large garage/shed & parking – yep.
?? Space – try 3083m2 approx. of it.
?? Peace & privacy – perched at the top of Maurice Street this is assured.
?? Paddock – yep – this one currently has a turkey called Tom living in it, but you could have a pony. Or a turkey.
?? Light-filled home – this split-level design makes the most of the available light filtering it in from the north facing windows.
?? Renovated country kitchen with butler's sink no less, butler not included.
?? A bit of a project – the main bathroom & ensuite could do with an update.
?? Hill’s Feels – double yes – ferns, gums, birdlife, views of far-off fields, wood-fired burner, slate floors – it doesn’t get more Hillsy than this.
With quick access out to Paternoster Road onto Pakenham or Berwick or into the thriving townships of Cockatoo & Emerald; this is an ideally located home with a real homely vibe.
Now put your list away and get to the open for inspection before its gone. And it will go quick.
If you need to know more call me on 0428744498.

Description:
CONVENIENT, CHARMING AND CHARACTER FILLED
Perfectly situated off the main road in a quiet service road, this charming weatherboard home is the ideal place for you to get into the property market. Surprisingly big, the home offers a sun drenched, spacious lounge room with a solid fuel fire and built in study bench, a large country style kitchen/meals room with crackling wood fire and enough room for you to cook up a storm, three bedrooms and a study room. The step down master is big enough for a king sized bed and has picture windows that overlook the colourful rear garden. Hardwood floors and double hung windows add to the charm of the home. Outdoors the fully fenced yard has side access to the ‘man cave’, plenty of room for pets and children and lots of room for a gardener to potter. Just a short walk will have you at our highly regarded Primary School, shopping centre or bus stop and the new walking trail that offers a kaleidoscope of colour as you take in the surrounding beauty. You should arrange your inspection today.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
GREAT OPPORTUNITY! – NORTH FACING WITH A BIG SHED
This great home on a fantastic north facing clear ½ acre (approx.) could be just what you’ve been looking for. With a cosy home consisting of 3 bedrooms, central bathroom with separate toilet, lounge and kitchen meals area with creature comforts that include ducted heating and a split system and a very warm wood heater. Outside the action really livens up with a double carport and 4 car garage set up as the ideal mancave including a wood heater, fridge and plenty of storage. The sunny block also features a secure chook run, raised veggie patch, cubby house and is securely fenced. There is also plenty of off street parking, with room to entertain your friends and family while watching your children and/or four legged friends play in the yard. All these beautiful features set in a quiet location where you can enjoy nature within a short drive to Cockatoo main hub your dream starts here! Contact Mick Dolphin now on 0429 684 522 or Steve Dolphin on 0412 996609 or Dineke Simpson on 0433 658 777 to arrange your inspection today.

Description:
FOUR BEDROOM HOME ON A FLAT BLOCK IN A QUIET STREET
Hidden away in a quiet spot on a flat block is this immaculately presented home on a flat and usable half acre (approx.) block. With four good size bedrooms, including master with updated ensuite and lovely central bathroom with a large character kitchen making it easy for you to move into and enjoy. Enjoy the toasty wood heater in the open plan lounge dining area on those winter evenings and outside you can enjoy the lovely summer evenings on the large deck with underneath doubling as a single carport. There is also plenty of off street parking with room to entertain your friends and family while watching your children and/or four legged friends play in the yard. The home also has a garden shed (single garage size) and a wood shed. All these beautiful features within a short drive to Cockatoo main hub you would be crazy not to have a look. Contact Mick Dolphin now on 0429 684 522 or Steve Dolphin on 0412 996609 to arrange your inspection today.

Description:
Make Mine a Mojito ??
SOLAR PASSIVE DESIGN ON 1 ACRE
Welcome to this stunning north facing 4 bedroom family home, situated centrally on the 4091m2 (approx) block, with two living areas, quality fixtures and beautiful wood-work features throughout.
The recycled red brick-lined driveway off Meyer Street brings you past the 6 car garage and up to the double carport. Meander up the garden path to the front door and the full character of this home is revealed. The master with large walk through robe and ensuite is zoned away from the further three bedrooms and features a wooden Japanese Soak Tub, no less! Soak in the tub or soak in the light that radiates into the main living space through the expanse of north facing timber windows.
There is a playful mix of materials used throughout the interior. A magnificent up-sized wooden island bench defines the open-plan Cook's Kitchen. The wood is set against the terracotta floor tiles, stainless steel appliances, Caesarstone benchtop, grey splashback & black mosaic tiles. Get mixing yourself in the dedicated bar zone with two bar fridges and open shelving. Make mine a Mojito! And hide all the mess in the butlers pantry with OCD shelving. All you need now is the butler.
I am particularly excited by the fireplace design that incorporates log storage and thick bevelled "teakwood" sandstone slabs for perching on. The epitome of Koselig!
I need a second living space I hear you cry! Well here it is. A cosy den with own access to the private backyard. Beyond, the rest of the bedrooms and main bathroom that echoes the design of the ensuite.
As the house is located centrally there are plenty of spaces around the garden to play. A screened and paved entertaining area at the front will be on the cool side of the house in the summer months and brick-paving along the north-face for sitting in the winter sun. Fully fenced - there is heaps of space for canines or kids games.
Back down the driveway, lets re-visit that garage. It's huge, on a slab and with own water tank. Could be re-imagined as dual-accommodation (STCA) or to run a business from home.
Other features include:
* Over 60,000 litres of tank water available as well as town water available as alternative
* Split-system & fans
* LED downlights in main living
* Fully fenced
* All bedrooms have built-in robes
* 3-phase power to shed
Passive solar design features include:
* Rockwool insulation
* Orientation of the home
* 1kw inverter & solar panels
* Solar hot water with booster
Cheers! ??

Description:
Light, Bright and Spacious!!!
Situated within walking distance of the shopping centre, bus stop and highly regarded Primary School, this beautifully presented home has been lovingly updated to provide a modern, functional home that offers versatility for the whole family. The large living room has gas heater and split system heating and cooling and adjoins the meals and kitchen that offers an 800mm stainless steel stove, Miele dishwasher, glass splash back, plenty of bench space and loads of cupboards. There are four bedrooms with the second bedroom and third bedroom having access to the balcony and the fourth can serve as a work from home office or second living area if required. Special features include polished timber floors, evaporative cooling, fresh modern colour scheme and large windows that allow plenty of natural light to flow through. Both bathrooms have been renovated ensuring there is not a cent to spend. There is a bungalow that would make an ideal teenagers pad, dependant relative accommodation or is a great space for work from home business, subject to council approval. Outdoors there is a manicured yard, off street parking, carport and a shed that would be perfect as a ‘man cave’. With everything at your fingertips you will be able to leave the car at home and put the savings towards your wonderful new property.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.
